channel.title: noodles on Mostly Harmless Cafe
channel.description: Recent content in noodles on Mostly Harmless Cafe

item.title: Japanese Wafu Pasta
item.description: Ingredients 1 lb spaghetti ¼ cup extra-virgin olive oil 8 Tbsp unsalted butter 4 cloves of garlic ¼ tsp salt 15 cranks of fresh cracked black pepper 1 lb shiitake mushrooms ¼ cup soy sauce 2 scallions (garnish) Instructions: Boil pasta for recommended time, set aside when done, reserving at least ½ cup of pasta water. In skillet on medium heat add olive oil with 4 Tbsp of butter. Once butter melts, add garlic and mushrooms.

item.title: Chow Mein
item.description: Ingredients (noodles): 400g egg noodles 2 chicken breasts (scored and chopped into bite-sized pieces) feel free to marinade 2 green onions (segmented) 1 carror (julienne) 3½ cups cabbage (about half of one head) 7 cloves of garlic (minced) 1 cup bean sprouts 2 Tbsp water Ingredients (sauce): 1½ Tbsp rice vinegar 2½ Tbsp soy sauce 2 Tbsp oyster sauce subst: hoisin sauce 3 tsp sesame oil 2 tsp cornstarch Instructions: Cook chicken to completion in wok, remove, and set to the side.
